CHINESE_SCHOLAR.greeting: 你好！Welcome to the realm of advanced Chinese. I am the Scholar of Written Language. Let me test your mastery of HSK 6 vocabulary and idioms.

IDIOM_MASTER.greeting: 欢迎！I am the Keeper of Idioms. Four-character phrases hold the wisdom of millennia. Show me your understanding of 成语.

GRAMMAR_SAGE.greeting: 问候！As the Grammar Sage, I will challenge your understanding of complex Chinese sentence structures and patterns.

LANGUAGE_GUARDIAN.greeting: 很高兴见到你！I protect the knowledge of the Chinese language. Answer correctly, and I will aid you on your journey.

HSK_BOSS.greeting: 你终于来了！I am the final examiner. Only those who have mastered HSK 6 can pass through. Prepare for the ultimate test!
